purpose: Automate the job application process by autonomously applying to relevant job postings on the internet
principle: Utilizes browser automation to navigate job sites and submit applications based on predefined criteria
reusability: Can be configured with different job criteria and integrated into existing workflows using its open-source codebase
limitations: Limited to job sites that do not have complex CAPTCHAs or anti-bot mechanisms; may require adjustments for different job site formats
name: jobber
description: browser controlling AI agent that applies to relavant jobs on internet autonomously. join chat @ https://discord.gg/umgnyQU2K8
highlight: Autonomously applies to relevant jobs online using browser automation
